list.name: Default
list.comment: Bug fixing: - issue #13 Intersect between a line and polygon doesn't work - fixed, added some tests - issue #15 Arc direction is undefined when parameter counterClockwise is omitted - fixed, now if omitted, set default value Flatten.CCW - remove method Face::getRelation(polygon) (fix for issue #2 from flatten-boolean-op: Issue with intersection of circle and box) - method was incorrect

SUITE.NAME: #Flatten.Segment.#Flatten.Segment.DistanceTo.Distance to Circle Case 3 End point out of the circle Coverage Results

task.summary: Default task
- polygon add methods get Box, get Vertices, deleteFace, clone - make face iterable by edges
Added class Ray
Added ray shooting algorithm (not completed)
Continued ray shooting algorithm (not completed)
Let Trevis does not fail
Ray shooting ready to test
- Ray shooting test & fix bugs - Added method contains to Polygon - Changed method box of Arc
- Add docs - Keep on testing
clean workspace
Split test by classes, add more tests for coverage
Add closest point to distance methods
Complete distance methods and move all to algorithms
clean workspace
Fix bugs in distance measurement algorithm
Add distance to polygon - naive approach, slow
Fix bugs, add more tests for better coverage

- Add new Distance shape2planarSet method based on interval trees - Updated point2shape methods to return [dist, shortest_segment] - Added new get vertices methods to Segment, Arc and Point (for viewer app)
- Fix technical bugs
- Fix technical bugs (2) - correct fix
Changes in Readme.md
Change in readme
Added Inversion class, not tested and not documented yet
Added spliFace method to polygon class
Rename splitFace to addVertex. Fix bugs and add tests
Added method setInclusion with some tests
Started Clip algorithm
- Added parameter "edges" to face.append, face.remove, face.insert methods - Edited documentation

Boolean operations test and fix (union) - Circle::toArc() method - end angle -pi instead of 3pi - Face::getRelation - initialize edges bv flags before recalcuation - Polygon::addVertex - no edges.update method in PlanarSet anymore, use delete and add - Ray shooting - skip vertex ip if between same edges and already counted - Ray shooting - fix technical bug in sorting - BooleanOp - clone both polygons in clip - calculate inclusion flags with original polygons for performance - consider face id when sorting intersection points - remove not relevant between points belong to same face
Move Boolean Operations to separate package
Create minified bundle
Deploy minified bundle
Move method setOverlap from BooleanOp package
Option to add any valid attribute to svg() methods + tests
Add method isSimple to check if no self intersection points (incomplete version)
Special case for zero-length segment in Segment Class methods
Update README.md - add link to Observable tutorials
Updated documentation and package
Typo in README
Fix bug in face.insertEdge
Update package
Fix bug in Segment intersection methods
some documentation
Enable face.svg() method to display different faces with different styles (attributes)
Just typo
Add missing intersections with polygon methods for Segment, Arc, Line, Circle, Polygon
Fix type (issue #12)

Bug fixing: - issue #13 Intersect between a line and polygon doesn't work - fixed, added some tests - issue #15 Arc direction is undefined when parameter counterClockwise is omitted - fixed, now if omitted, set default value Flatten.CCW - remove method Face::getRelation(polygon) (fix for issue #2 from flatten-boolean-op: Issue with intersection of circle and box) - method was incorrect

MESSAGE.value: Rename splitFace to addVertex. Fix bugs and add tests
Added method setInclusion with some tests
Started Clip algorithm
- Added parameter "edges" to face.append, face.remove, face.insert methods - Edited documentation

Boolean operations test and fix (union) - Circle::toArc() method - end angle -pi instead of 3pi - Face::getRelation - initialize edges bv flags before recalcuation - Polygon::addVertex - no edges.update method in PlanarSet anymore, use delete and add - Ray shooting - skip vertex ip if between same edges and already counted - Ray shooting - fix technical bug in sorting - BooleanOp - clone both polygons in clip - calculate inclusion flags with original polygons for performance - consider face id when sorting intersection points - remove not relevant between points belong to same face
Move Boolean Operations to separate package
Create minified bundle
Deploy minified bundle
Move method setOverlap from BooleanOp package
Option to add any valid attribute to svg() methods + tests
Add method isSimple to check if no self intersection points (incomplete version)
Special case for zero-length segment in Segment Class methods
Update README.md - add link to Observable tutorials
Updated documentation and package
Typo in README
Fix bug in face.insertEdge
Update package
Fix bug in Segment intersection methods
some documentation
Enable face.svg() method to display different faces with different styles (attributes)
Just typo
Add missing intersections with polygon methods for Segment, Arc, Line, Circle, Polygon
Fix type (issue #12)

Bug fixing: - issue #13 Intersect between a line and polygon doesn't work - fixed, added some tests - issue #15 Arc direction is undefined when parameter counterClockwise is omitted - fixed, now if omitted, set default value Flatten.CCW - remove method Face::getRelation(polygon) (fix for issue #2 from flatten-boolean-op: Issue with intersection of circle and box) - method was incorrect

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Bug fixing: - issue #13 Intersect between a line and polygon doesn't work - fixed, added some tests - issue #15 Arc direction is undefined when parameter counterClockwise is omitted - fixed, now if omitted, set default value Flatten.CCW - remove method Face::getRelation(polygon) (fix for issue #2 from flatten-boolean-op: Issue with intersection of circle and box) - method was incorrect
